name: GDubA StarZone
description:
Welcome to the STARZONE.

This is an early start for a project to come in the future, stay tuned!  The demo above is so you can see what the game might be like.

Controls:

  • Run = A, D, Arrow Keys, & Left Analog Stick.
  • Jump = Space, Z,  & A (Xbox).
  • PowDash = In the air press E, RT (Xbox) to launch diagonally downward in the direction you're facing.
  • Wall Slide = Hold the Run button against a wall to slowly slide downward.
  • Wall Jump = Press the Jump button while preforming Wall Slide to jump off the wall.
